en: If you have to guess, solve a random cell. Repeat until you no longer have to guess.
If the sum value of target visible 3x3 area is exactly 21, gain a revive.
Gain 5 defense. Every 30 turns, lose 1 defense until you have none.
[1 Head Armor] Fortify by 5 whenever you gain a legendary or divine item.
Transform all of your items into 10 coins each.
Full heal, then gain souls equal to your life. Every 5 turns, you lose 1 life.
Does weird things to a target living object. Maybe we shouldn't mess with this?
Enchant target cell: apply a random aura to this cell each turn.
Automatically discharges whenever you take less damage than the max stage power. The max stage power becomes the amount of damage taken.
Target cell gains or loses Sanctified.
Every 400 cells opened, you win the current stage.
Gain coins equal to the combined value of the visible cells with the highest value.
When you enter the final stage, lose this item and gain two omens.
Guarantees 1 Mystic Statue per stage. Whenever you activate a Mystic Statue, restore 5 lives.
Negates death once. At the end of the stage, if you've opened at least 50 cells without making a mistake and have no revives, gain a revive.
Destroy all of your status effect omens. For the next 10 turns, you are immune to omens.
Gain a random armor item whenever you enter a special stage. Whenever you gain defense, fortify all of your armor by the same amount.
Restore 1 life whenever you spend at least 5 coins.
Whenever a monster is revealed, activate a random targeted magic item on its cell before taking damage.
The first diamond you collect each turn will fully charge a random magic item.
Whenever a heart is collected, duplicast your magic items.
Monsters roll five times for damage and use the weakest result.
Every 100 cells you open, restore your life to max.
Every 100 cells you open, fully charge your magic items.
Targeted items affect the entire column of cells.
At the start of each stage, reveal any cells that have guaranteed objects in a 3x3 area.
Apply random auras to a number of cells equal to triple your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your mastery ability is activated.
Increase your life cap for the next dimension by 3 for each different type of aura in the Metagate.
Every 15 cells you open without making a mistake, reduce the monster count of all other stages by 1.
Whenever a monster dies or flees, reduce the monster count of all other stages.
Automatically discharges when you lose morality. Gain Coal, then apply Burning to a random cell for each Coal you have.
Use random targeted magic effect on target 3x3 area. Do you feel lucky, punk?
Use random targeted magic effects on target 3x3 area. This could get messy.
Gain 2 defense, then transform this into Banana Peel.
Enchant target visible cell: each turn, kill any living object in this cell.
[2 Head Armor] Instead of spending coins, reduce the durability of this armor by 1.
Automatically discharges when you spend coins. Gain the amount of coins spent.
Gain 5 coins times your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
If you step through the Dimensional Portal with at least 100 coins, you will start the next dimension with 30 coins.
Spawn a familiar in target empty cell, the value of which then determines the number of additional Familiars to spawn.
Spawn a familiar in target empty cell.
Activate Rotting Head for every 2 mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Whenever a Guide is killed, reduce the cost of other visible Guides by 10.
Destroy all of your Minions and spawn 2 souls for each.
Consume a random meat item to gain a soul.
Spawn a familiar near target visible cell, then enchant the target cell: block living objects and disperse projectiles.
You may left click a projectile to rotate its direction of travel, clockwise.
Solve a number of random cells equal to your sealed inventory slots plus 1.
At the start of each stage, reveal all cells near visible cells and kill any monsters within.
You can powerchord any cell of value 4 or greater.
[3 Leg Armor] Every 50 turns, gain a random omen if you just clicked on a 3 or greater.
Throw at target stranger and be prepared to have a radical time, dude!
Whenever a monster is revealed by an effect, it has a 50% chance to flee.
Scientists are more common and cost half as much. You may right click a Scientist to change his effect for 1 coin.
Activate all visible strangers for free.
Whenever you discover a 5 or greater, it gains Burning. Burning cells have a 5% chance to send a Flare in a random direction each turn.
You have an additional 5% chance to powerchord.
You have an additional 3% chance to powerchord.
50% chance to spawn a heart during the next 100 turns.
Cook by removing Burning from target visible cell, then restore 3 lives. Or sell raw at an Item Shop for 30 coins.
Whenever you discover a 5 or greater, reveal a random nearby 3x3 area and kill any monsters within. If you're about to take damage, this Minion will sacrifice itself to deflect 10 damage.
Nomads are more common and cost half as much. You may right click a Nomad to refresh his inventory for 3 coins.
Lots of Minions spawn in the wild.
Gain a random favored item at the start of each stage. You are even more likely to find favored items.
When you enter a stage, gain souls equal to the number of times your mastery's ultimate ability has been activated.
Every 20 turns, convert all visible loot to omens.
When you would gain an item, lose this item instead.
Whenever you lose life, lose the same amount of life after 50 turns.
Each stage, negate incoming damage until after your first mistake.
Every 50 turns, increase the power of all stages by 1.
Whenever you gain an omen, destroy it as well as the first item in your inventory.
When you enter a stage, it gains a random stage mod.
40% chance to spawn a heart whenever you pick up a coin.
Right-click to consume the first item in your inventory and restore 1 life.
20% chance to spawn a heart whenever you pick up a coin.
Solve a cell and lose 1 life. This item has a 90% chance to remain charged after use.
Every 100 cells you open, gain 1 soul.
Kill a random visible monster and gain 200 mana.
When you enter a stage, increase the monster count by 10.
When you complete a stage, gain 1 max life for every diamond or chest left behind.
For 3 turns, any monster damage you would take heals you instead.
Kill target visible monster. It will drop an item.
You will only find magic items until you gain a magic item.
You must have 3 or more magic items to open this egg!
Duplicast your magic items, then manalock them for 20 turns.
Explode target numbered cell in a 3x3 area.
Explode all visible cells of value 5 and greater, and all nearby cells.
Convert all visible loot to Bones.
Gain Bones. While charged, you can bury Bones in hidden cells to reveal them.
Item chests also contain Bones. If you are not injured when you bury Bones, gain souls instead of restoring life.
Bury in a random cell to give it Sanctified, then restore lives equal to the cell's value.
Burn target sign, then fully heal by passing a number of turns equal to your missing lives, restoring 1 life per turn.
Burn target sign and gain 3 souls.
Pick up hearts at full life to kill a random monster, revealing it if necessary.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain defense.
Pick up hearts at full life to glean a random hidden cell.
You are immune to omens. Destroy this item after 333 turns. Pick up hearts at full life to extend this effect by 50 turns.
Pick up hearts at full life to spawn 3 Spookers.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain 10 coins.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain a Minion.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain a soul.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain 1% pathfinding.
Collect hearts at full life to gain a mastery charge.
Randomizes all numbers shown in tooltips.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain Bones.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain 1% powerchording.
Pick up hearts at full life to gain 100 mana.
Pick up hearts at full life to solve a random cell.
Gain a random Book item for every 3 mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Keep your research subject and any items related to it for the next dimension.
Reveal target cell if it's not already open. If the cell has a monster, 300 mana is returned to this item and the monster will explode in a 5x5 area after 10 turns.
Solve a random cell. It explodes. After you open 40 cells, gain Boomerang.
Blow up a 3x3 area around a random hidden cell. After you open 50 cells, gain Boomerang.
Every 5 minutes, lose half of your lives.
Automatically discharges when you have to guess.
Tells you whether you must make a guess to proceed.
Lose 5 coins whenever a cell becomes unflagged.
Convert all visible monsters to familiars.
For the next 10 turns, you can powerchord any cell.
Gain 3% pathfinding. Solve all cells near visible cells with a value equal to one-tenth of your pathfinding or less.
50% chance to break your chain each turn.
Your restore life effects are reduced by 1.
You cannot use items that you have more than one of.
Your defense is capped to the minimum stage power.
After opening 50 cells, spawn a Sawblade.
Mercenaries are more common and cost half as much. Before hiring, you may right click on a Mercenary to relocate him to a random cell for 1 coin.
[1 Leg Armor] Every 50 cells opened, bubble all of your armor if you just clicked on a 3 or greater.
[6 Body Armor] Fortify whenever you pop a bubble.
[2 Head Armor] Fortify whenever you pop a bubble. If this armor survives damage, bubble it.
Trap all visible objects in bubbles.
Trap all visible objects on numbered cells in bubbles, then restore 1 life for each object trapped this way.
Bubble the last item in your inventory, as long as it isn't Bubble Wrap.
Bubble 5 random items that aren't Bubble Wrap.
Duplicate random bubbles equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Bring up to 5 bubbles into the next dimension.
Projectiles have a 50% chance to pierce.
Spawn familiars on the visible cell or cells with the highest value.
Spawn familiars on all visible cells of value 3 or greater and pass a turn.
Spawn a Rabbit when your ultimate ability is activated.
[1 Head Armor] When equipped, fortify by your number of Easter eggs. Gain an additional token for every egg you put into an Egg Basket.
[2 Leg Armor] Burning cells do not hurt you. Fortify whenever an object is destroyed by Burning.
Burning cells deal 1 additional point of life loss. Every 50 turns, lose your first consumable item and apply Burning to a random cell.
Spawners are more common. Strangers are no longer killed when a Spawner breaks.
Drop all of your items on the ground.
Whenever you take monster damage, gain 3% evasion.
You can see information about locked stages.
Spawn a random stranger. If you have at least 50 coins, spawn 3 random strangers instead.
Spawn a Sawblade. Until your next mistake, your Sawblades can reveal flagged cells. If the flagged cell was empty, your Sawblade loses 1 lifespan.
Automatically discharges when the sum of your chain is 5 or greater. Gain a Candle, then reveal cells equal to your number of Candles.
Reveal a number of random cells equal to the visible cell with the highest value.
25% chance to spawn a heart during the next 10 turns.
If you spend at least 25 coins in an Item Shop, it remains open.
If you spend coins in an Item Shop, it remains open.
Lose your mastery, coins, and all of your items. Get them back at the start of the next stage.
When you enter a stage, set your max lives to your lives.
Relocate target object to a random visible cell.
Destroy a random omen and gain Witches Brew.
Destroy 2 random omens and gain a random magic item.
Whenever you target a cell with an item, take damage equal to the value of the cell.
Whenever you discover a cell of value 6 or greater, gain 2 souls.
Your familiars move extra times equal to the length of your chain. You can powerchord any cell as long as the length of your chain is 6 turns or greater.
[1 Body Armor] Fortify whenever the length of your chain becomes greater than this item's durability.
Kill target visible monster or stranger, spawn a number of Sawblades equal to the cell's value, then set the lifespan of your Sawblades to your chain length.
Spawn a Sawblade on target empty cell and set its lifespan to the length of your chain.
Uncompletes or unlocks a random stage. Manalock for 50 turns.
When you enter an Item Shop, cut the prices in half.
All legendary items are transformed into passive items that are worth less.
[1 Head Armor] Whenever you consume an item, gain coins equal to half its value.
Every 60 turns, transform a Minion into a Big Minion or gain a Minion if you don't have any.
25% chance to gain 50 mana during the next 10 turns.
25% chance to fully charge a random magic item during the next 10 turns.
[3 Leg Armor] Every 30 turns, fortify by 1 if you just clicked on a cell with a value equal to the number of stage mods.
[7 Body Armor] When you enter a stage, fortify by the number of stage mods.
Monsters attack additional times equal to the number of stage mods.
[4 Head Armor] Whenever this takes damage, fortify by 1 if there are any stage mods.
Flag a number of monsters equal to the current stage's max power.
Monsters have a 50% chance to attack an extra time.
While charged, all chests contain Soft Clay.
When you complete a stage, your omens have a 50% chance to transform into a random item.
Whenever you discover a cell of value 6 or greater, gain 2% evasion.
At the end of each stage, duplicate all visible objects.
After you purchase an item from an Item Shop, immediately leave.
Gain 5% evasion. When you evade a monster, kill it.
You cannot gain morality. Whenever you lose morality, you get burnt.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Toxic to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Toxic cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
Every 10 turns, restore 1 life until you have full life.
Until you make a mistake, restore 2 lives whenever you discover a cell of value 4 or greater.
Whenever you collect loot, spawn a Canker in its place.
Before entering a stage, remove a random stage mod.
Spawn familiars equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Increase your life cap for the next dimensions by the number of Familiars in the Metagate.
Chests have an additional 10% chance to contain Contagion.
Enchant target visible cell: each turn, kill any living object in this cell and apply this enchantment to a random nearby cell.
If you are injured, loot may drop in cells with a value greater than 0.
[6 Head Armor] Whenever this takes damage, kill the attacking monster.
Automatically discharges when you spend coins. Gain one-tenth of the coins spent as defense, rounded down.
Whenever damage reduces your life to 1, gain a revive.
When you target a cell with an item, it gains Frozen. When you complete a stage, gain 1 soul for each Frozen cell of value 5 or greater.
Convert target chest into an item.
Whenever you pick up a diamond, gain 1 soul.
Kill strangers and landmarks in target visible 3x3 area.
You can use uncharged magic items, consuming them after use.
Kill visible monsters. If the monster is standing on a 3 or greater, this dagger breaks.
Guarantees 3 additional Dark Hearts per stage. Collect Dark Hearts to restore 3 lives and gain a random omen.
Solve 10 cells whenever you gain or lose an omen.
50% chance to lose 1 life at the end of each stage.
Transform a random omen into a random omen.
Destroy a random omen and lose lives equal to its position in your inventory.
The top half of each stage is Sanctified.
Whenever you target a visible cell with an item, solve a number of random cells equal to the value of the target.
Gain a random card item that you don't already have.
[1 Head Armor] Remove all fake cell values. Cell values are always correct.
Spawn Barrels equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Whenever you blow up an object in the Metagate, spawn a Guide.
Add a random stage mod to the selected stage for each of your omens. Then, lose all omens.
Add a random stage mod to the selected stage. Then, gain souls equal to your number of omens.
Flag all hidden monsters in target 7x7 area. Kill all visible monsters in this area. Remove the last boss mod from each boss in this area.
Elders are more common. You may right click an Elder to charge your mastery instead.
Automatically discharges whenever a status effect expires. Gain the same status effect.
Solve 3 cells times your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Spawn a Guide when you activate your mastery.
Doubles your chance to find diamonds.
[6 Leg Armor] Every 30 turns, spawn a number of diamonds equal to the value of the cell you just clicked on.
Every 50 cells opened, spawn a diamond.
[14 Body Armor] Fortify by 2 whenever you collect a diamond.
[8 Head Armor] Spawn a diamond whenever this armor takes 2 or more damage. Fortify by 1 whenever you collect a diamond.
Slightly increases your chance to find diamonds.
Convert all visible loot to diamonds.
Rerolls the mods on a selected stage, guaranteeing at least one stage mod.
Rerolls the mods of all stages.
25% chance to gain a revive. Otherwise, well... you don't want to know.
Gain 2% pathfinding whenever a sign spawns.
Orbs explode in a 3x3 area when clicked. Spawn 3 Cankers when you gain this item.
Gain 30% evasion. When you successfully evade, relocate visible monsters to random cells and pass 3 turns.
Double the value of a random cell each stage.
Upgrade your Minions, or gain a Minion if you don't have any.
When you enter a stage, gain souls equal to your number of Minions. If you don't have any, gain a Minion instead.
When you open half of all empty cells, spawn a Harbinger. Harbingers activate an additional time.
Each stage has an additional Harbinger. Pay a Harbingers to make its effect beneficial.
Every 100 cells opened, gain 1 morality. If your morality is 10 or greater, gain a soul.
Spawn a coin whenever you discover a cell of value 4 or greater.
For a number of turns equal to the monsters you have killed plus 1, you can powerchord any cell.
Magic items will keep 50% of their mana after use.
Complete the current stage. Manalock for 100 turns.
When you start a stage, your guaranteed objects spawn inside Bubbles.
Enchant target visible cell: each turn, increase this cell's value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, upgrade the loot in this cell or spawn a coin here, then reset the cell value.
Waterboys are more common and cost half as much. You may right click to move them for free.
Every 20 turns, reveal a number of monsters equal to the length of your chain. Cancel this effect if you don't have a chain.
Cells generate triple mana for the next 20 turns. Just be careful, ok?
Cells generate double mana until you make a mistake. Far out, man.
Whenever you discover a 5 or greater, gain 1 defense.
At the end of each stage, lose half of your mana.
Reduce your next source of life loss by 1 plus the number of monsters you have killed.
Lose all items with a position in your inventory greater than sum of target 3x3 visible area.
The bottom half of each stage is Cursed.
Activate items that would trigger when you discover a cell of a certain value.
Stage mods cannot be created nor removed.
When you target a cell with an item, enchant the cell: increase the value of this cell by 1 each turn. If it's 10 or greater, use the original item here then reset the cell value.
You can become a ghost. After 20 turns as a ghost, you lose.
You can become a ghost. After opening 200 cells as a ghost, you lose.
Guarantees one Obelisk every stage. Improves the quality of your Tablets.
Lose all of your Easter eggs and gain a Token for each egg lost this way.
[5 Body Armor] Monsters in Electric cells deal normal damage. Fortify whenever you collect loot from an Electric cell.
At the start of each stage, all monsters on cells of value 3 or greater gain Electric.
Apply Electric to all cells. After 1 turn, all cells lose their auras.
When you target a cell with an item, it gains Electric. When you complete a stage, gain 1 soul for each Electric cell of value 5 or greater.
At the start of each stage, all 0-value cells gain Electric.
Spread all auras to nearby cells.
For a number of turns equal to the sum of target visible 3x3 area, you can powerchord any cell that has an aura.
Known for its powerful intoxicating properties among the Elf folk. Banned in the North Pole. Do not give to children.
For 5 turns, solve a cell each turn. This effect lasts an additional turn for each of your Minions.
If you have to guess, gain a revive. If not, you die.
Stages no longer have a guaranteed chest.
Kill target living object and enchant its cell: each turn, increase this cell's value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, spawn and kill the same living object, then reset the cell value.
[2 Leg Armor] Every 30 turns, enchant the last cell you opened: increase the value of this cell by 1 each turn. If it's 10 or greater, reset its value and fortify all of your armor by the value.
[5 Body Armor] Fortify by the cell value whenever you enchant a cell.
[3 Head Armor] When equipped, fortify by the number of enchanted cells.
Magic items will trigger an extra time.
Gain coins in increments of 5 equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Gain Minions equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Gain Bones equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Gain pathfinding equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Gain defense equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Gain souls equal to one-tenth the sum of target visible 3x3 area, rounded down.
Convert a random duplicate item into an item worth around twice as much, then gain a copy of this item.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Ethereal to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Ethereal cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
When you target a cell with an item, it gains Ethereal.
Targeted items affect the entire row of cells.
Lose all of your omens. 10% chance to get them back at the start of each stage.
Lose all of your omens. Get them back at the start of the next stage.
You can kill monsters and bosses if your morality is 30 or greater. Lose this item if you are immoral.
Lose an omen for every 2 mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
If you have no omens when a Guide spawns, increase his reward amount by 1.
Whenever you lose an item, explode 4 random cells.
Lose a random item every 20 turns.
You may find duplicate items. When you enter a stage, reduce the minimum power by your highest number of duplicates.
Gain 3 copies of the next item you consume, then lose this item.
Automatically discharges when you discover a cell of value 5 or greater and correctly flags the surrounding cells.
Chance to find treasure increases with missing life.
Reduce the current stage's max power to its min power.
Reduce the current stage's power to 1.
When you enter a stage, reduce the minimum stage power to 1.
Spawn a Dark Heart every 10 turns. Whenever a heart is collected, increase the stage power.
Whenever you discover a 3 or greater, glean all nearby hidden cells.
Stages have 2 Cursed cells for each of your omens. Monsters are empowered by empty Cursed cells.
Lose 5% pathfinding at the end of each stage.
Triples your chance to find coins.
After 500 turns, this item will blow up and kill you.
Your targeted items have a 50% chance to explode the target instead, burning you and destroying the item in the process.
Monster damage is capped to your number of items.
Monsters roll extra times for damage equal to your number of omens, and use the weakest result.
Gain Minions equal to the current stage's minimum power.
Unequip your armor. You cannot wear armor.
Apply Burning to a 3x3 area around target cell.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Burning to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Burning cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
Send Flares in all directions from target visible cell.
Burn random monsters equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Increase your life cap for the next dimension by the number of Burning cells in the Metagate.
Every 30 turns, each stage gains a Burning cell. Glean cells near Burning cells.
Gain defense equal to the current stage's minimum power.
When you enter a stage, restore 1 life each turn until you make a mistake.
Cook by removing Burning from target visible cell, then restore 2 lives. Or sell raw at an Item Shop for 10 coins.
You can go fishing at Wishpools. Guarantees 1 Wishpool per stage. Wishpools spawn with 3 additional charges.
Guarantees 1 Wishpool per stage. You may right click a Wishpool to go fishing: reduce its charges by 1, pass a turn, and see what you reel in!
Reveal target cell causing its monster to flee, then remove Dark mod from the current stage.
Whenever you consume an item, activate its effect again.
Gain max life equal to the current stage's minimum power.
Gain 20% pathfinding and manalock for 100 turns. Lose the same amount of pathfinding after 100 turns.
Coin chests will instead steal your money.
Fortify each armor by 100% of its current durability. If you are not wearing armor, gain 3 defense instead.
Fortify your leftmost armor by 100% of its current durability.
Adds the Trusty mod to the selected stage.
Convert target stranger or monster into a landmark.
Strangers send a Flare in a random direction each turn.
Your chests are strong familiars. You can still open them.
Doubles your chance to find strangers.
Slightly increases your chance to find strangers.
Freeze target visible living object or explode target Frozen cell in a 5x5 area.
Automatically discharges whenever you discover a 4 or greater and freezes 1 to 3 random monsters.
You cannot gain more than 1 coin at a time. 50% chance to apply Frozen to coin drops.
[3 Head Armor] All Frozen cells are gleaned. Fortify whenever a monster becomes frozen.
After 50 turns without making a mistake, you win the current stage.
You are immune to omens until your next mistake.
You are immune to omens until your next mistake. Lose a random omen when this status effect expires.
Items from chests will drop on the ground.
Non-omen items from chests will drop on the ground.
Many of your diamonds will be purple diamonds.
After each stage, you will visit a random special stage.
[3 Body Armor] At the start of each stage, obscure all visible numbered cells. Negate damage from monsters near obscured cells.
Activate Ectoplasm and set its counter to 30 times your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Gain Ectoplasm when you enter the Dimensional Portal. Keep it for the next dimension.
Receive a random shop item for free.
Receive selected shop item for free.
Transform a random item into a Present.
When you gain this item, restore your life to max and gain 10 souls. When you lose this item, cut your max lives in half.
When you gain this item, fully charge and duplicast your magic items. When you lose this item, deplete your mana.
You cannot powerchord. Whenever you chord a 1, lose 1 life.
Gain 10% pathfinding. Lose the same amount if you lose this item.
Gain 15% pathfinding. Lose all of your pathfinding if you lose this item.
Spawn a Canker. Your orbs move erratically.
Each point of mana replenishes all of your magic items.
Whenever you gain a consumable item, use it right away.
If you use a magic item, you lose that item.
Double your morality. If your absolute morality is 30 or greater, reduce the stage power to 1.
Lose a legendary item and gain a revive.
You may have multiple legendary items.
Items you find will be worth at least 30 coins.
Doubles your chance to find coins.
Gain 3 souls and lose all of your coins.
[3 Leg Armor] Every 10 turns, spawn 10 coins if you just clicked on a 4 or greater.
[9 Body Armor] If this armor would break, lose all of your coins and fortify by 1 for every 5 coins lost this way.
When you enter a stage, increase the monster count for every 10 coins you have.
Every 50 cells opened, gain between 25 and 100 coins.
[5 Head Armor] Spawn 5 coins whenever this armor takes damage. Fortify by 1 whenever you collect a coin from a cell with a value of 3 or greater.
Slightly increases your chance to find coins.
Coin drops are converted to monsters.
Priests are more common and cost half as much. They will remove all of your omens at once.
Gain souls equal to your defense and gain defense equal to your lives, up to a maximum of 5 each.
Whenever you lose an item, get it back after 100 turns.
You will only find passive items until you gain a passive item.
You must have 4 or more passive items to open this egg!
Every 20 turns, all visible monsters that are not in the quadrant of the cell you open will flee. Whenever a monster flees, add it to the next stage.
Lose up to half your coins at the end of each stage.
You will only find consumable items until you gain a consumable item.
You must have 5 or more consumable items to open this egg!
Whenever you gain an orb, increase size and speed of all orbs.
Each turn you click on an empty cell, a random visible stranger relocates to that cell.
Monsters deal extra damage equal to your number of omens.
Gain defense equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
If you step through the Dimensional Portal with at least 20 defense, you will start the next dimension with 5 defense.
For 25 seconds, whenever you spend coins on a stranger, gain a soul.
[2 Leg Armor] Every 30 turns, glean all hidden cells in a 5x5 area around the cell you just clicked on.
At the end of each stage, gain 1 revive and cut your max life in half. Consume the Halo when enough is enough!
Set your max life to 1. Gain 3 revives.
Whenever you leave a stage, steal coins from all visible strangers equal to their price.
Spawn a random stranger in target empty cell.
When you leave a stage, bubble your familiars. When a monster tries to flee, it becomes your familiar instead.
Gain 15% evasion. Your evasion also gives you a chance to avoid omen effects.
Mistakes have a 75% chance to be considered happy accidents (thereby ignoring 'on mistake' effects).
Magic items will keep 25% of their mana after use.
Whenever you restore life, restore the same amount of life after 50 turns.
Whenever you collect a heart, a random visible monster becomes your familiar. Whenever a familiar dies, spawn a heart.
You cannot restore more than 1 life at a time.
Convert all visible loot to hearts.
Every 50 turns, gain 1 defense if you are not injured.
Your inventory is considered full at half capacity.
When you enter a stage, triple its minimum power.
[4 Body Armor] Fortify by 3 whenever you gain an omen.
Treasure chests may contain more valuable items.
Gain 30 mana for each damage taken.
Item chests also contain a random potion.
When you enter a stage, reduce the max power by 1. If you have a legendary item, cut the max power in half instead.
Some coins will become Ancient Coins.
When you enter an Item Shop, increase the prices.
50% chance to negate the effect of an omen when it triggers.
You are immune to omens while you are injured.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Sanctified to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Sanctified cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
Your guaranteed chests will be Special Chests. Activate Special Chest effects twice.
If your morality is positive, lose a random omen. If you are immoral, gain a random omen.
You will find twice as much loot until your next mistake.
Until your next mistake, you have omen immunity, chests cannot contain omens, and coins are worth 1 more.
Lose 1 life when you consume an item.
Double the duration of your status effects.
[20 Head Armor] Does not repair automatically. Whenever this takes damage, explode a number of random cells equal to the damage taken.
Gain morality equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated. If you are immoral, lose morality instead.
Start the next dimension with half of your morality.
Stages have an additional Hungry Plant.
Gain Minions equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
You will not lose your Minions when stepping through the Dimensional Portal.
Whenever you use a Minion, gain a Minion after 50 turns.

Each stage has an additional Wishpool. You cannot activate Wishpools. Whenever a Wishpool gains a charge, drop your other items on the ground then destroy visible objects in the same quadrant as the Wishpool.
Whenever you gain an item, gain a copy of that item.
Flag 25% of all monsters when you begin a stage.
Increase your status effect counters by 5 times your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Increase your life cap for the next dimension by your number of status effects.
Apply Frozen to a 3x3 area around target cell.
If target cell has Frozen, remove the aura, then solve it and all nearby cells.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Frozen to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Frozen cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
Gain a revive for every 3 mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
If you step through the Dimensional Portal with at least 3 revives, start the next dimension with a revive.
Whenever you discover a cell of value 6 or greater, lose 1 max life.
Complete the selected stage and uncomplete the surrounding stages.
Spawn a familiar on target empty cell and pass a turn.
Convert all visible heart drops into defense.
Gain 3 defense whenever your armor breaks.
When you complete a stage, gain 1 defense for every diamond or chest left behind.
[3 Leg Armor] Every 50 turns, gain Bones equal to the value of the cell you just clicked on.
[7 Body Armor] Whenever you bury Bones, fortify by the value of the cell the Bones are buried in.
Replace your mastery with another random mastery. It starts fully charged.
Reveal target cell and gain a random omen.
Reveal target cell, then manalock for 50 turns. Expand the radius of this item by your number of omens.
Target cell gains or loses Toxic.
Gain a mastery charge. If you have activated your ultimate ability before, activate it now for free.
Whenever you discover a 4 or greater, pass a turn.
If you open 10 cells within 10 seconds of gaining an omen, lose the omen.
Spawn diamonds on visible cells in target 3x3 area. Convert any diamonds that were already in this area into purple diamonds.
Every 20 cells opened without making a mistake, spawn a familiar then solve all cells near your familiars.
Fortify all of your armor by your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Start the next dimension with your leftmost armor. It loses any durability above its base durability.
Your next chord becomes a powerchord.
Kill target visible monster and reveal any monsters nearby.
For a number of turns equal to your total mana plus 1, you cannot take damage from failed guesses.
Enchant 10 random cells each stage: when you chord or target this cell with an item, blow up the nearby 3x3 area and remove the enchantment.
Glean target hidden cell. If it's a 2 or greater, this item retains its mana.
Glean hidden cells in target 3x3 area.
Gain 1 soul for each consumable item you have. For the next 300 turns, you cannot restore life.
Lose 5% evasion at the end of each stage.
You cannot pan the board outside of view.
[1 Leg Armor] Every 10 turns, gain a Minion if you just clicked on a 4 or greater.
[2 Head Armor] Fortify by 1 whenever a Minion dies.
[3 Body Armor] Fortify by 2 whenever a Minion dies.
Remove all status effects and any items they are related to. Gain a revive if you removed 3 or more status effects this way.
Remove all status effects and any items they are related to. Restore 1 life for each status effect removed this way.
Whenever a status effect expires, gain the same status effect.
Visit a Library from the overworld. Libraries will have an additional research subject.
Doubles your chance to find hearts.
Slightly increases your chance to find lives.
Every 5 turns, apply electric to a random visible cell.
Fully discharge a random magic item instead of taking damage.

Enchant target visible cell, apply Electric to it: each turn, increase the value by 1. If it's 10 or greater, kill monsters in this quadrant equal to the number of Electric cells in this quadrant, then reset the value.
Enchant 10 random cells each stage: when you chord or target this cell with an item, reveal the nearby 5x5 area and remove the enchantment.
[1 Leg Armor] Every 10 turns, reveal all cells around the cell you open.
[5 Body Armor] Fortify by 2 whenever a monster is revealed by an effect.
[1 Head Armor] When equipped, reveal target column. Fortify whenever a monster is revealed by an effect.
When you enter a stage, gain Minions equal to the maximum power.
When you spend coins, this transforms into an item worth the amount spent.
Gain 40 coins. Every 20 turns, spend 10 coins on debt.
Reveal target row. Kill all monsters in the row and return 20 mana to this item for each monster killed this way.
Restore lives equal to the value of target numbered cell.
Spawn random strangers on 0-value cells within target visible 3x3 area.
Triples your chance to find legendary and divine items.
Spawn a sawblade then reveal a number of monsters equal to your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when your ultimate ability is activated.
Spawn a Sawblade at the start of the next dimension and set its lifespan equal to the number of orbs you had.
Every 20 turns, convert all strangers into monsters.
Reduce the selected stage's monster count by 5.
Add 10 monsters to the selected uncompleted stage. Remove 5 monsters from all other stages.
Lose a number of omens equal to the value of target numbered cell, then gain that many random omens.
Rerolls the mods on a selected stage, guaranteeing at least one stage mod.
Fortify all of your armor by 100% of their current durability.
Use Minion. If you're about to take damage, this item will discharge to deflect 1 damage.
Gain a soul, plus 1 soul for every 200 mana you have.
Exit the current stage without completing. Manalock for 20 turns.
Whenever you consume an item, gain 50 mana.
For 1 turn, your targeted items affect the entire column and row of cells.
Relocate the closest visible object to target visible cell.
Cell values are visible even when the cell is occupied.
Reveal and kill any monsters in target area, then lose a random weapon. The radius of this item is equal to your number of weapons.
Each turn, gain mana equal to the sum of your chain.
Stages have additional Ethereal cells equal to the minimum power. When you complete a stage, gain 50 mana for each visible Ethereal cell.
When you complete a stage, gain 100 mana for every diamond or chest left behind.
Every 10 turns, if it's possible to fully discharge a random magic item, do so and lose 1 life.
When you enter a stage, gain 2 souls for every stage mod.
When you enter a stage with 3 or more stage mods, gain a revive.
Whenever you discover a cell of value 6 or greater, gain 2% pathfinding.
Increase the length of your chain by 3 times your mastery charges at the start of each stage, and when you activate your ultimate ability.
Increase your life and defense cap for the next dimension by the length of your chain when you entered the portal.

Remove Burning from target 7x7 area and gain 1% pathfinding for each aura removed this way. If you removed fewer than 5, transform into Toasted Marshmallow. Otherwise, transform into Burnt Marshmallow.

Remove Burning from target visible cell. If the cell has a value of 3, transform this item into Toasted Marshmallow. If the cell has a value of 4 or greater, transform this item into Burnt Marshmallow.
Activate your mastery's ultimate ability, then manalock for 100 turns.
Pyros are more common and cost half as much. They will send flares in all directions.
Pyros are more common and cost half as much. They will also send flares in the opposite direction.
When you enter a stage, the first cell you chord becomes a powerchord. Every 10 monsters you kill, gain a soul.
Convert all visible strangers into spawners of the same type, then unseal an inventory slot for each stranger converted this way.
Triple the duration of your status effects.

While charged, all chests will contain coins.

Bubble the first 3 other items in your inventory. When you pop a bubble, destroy its contents.
Gain 1 defense. For the next 300 turns, you can powerchord Sanctified cells.
Decrease the lifespan of your Sawblades each turn. Spawn a Sawblade whenever a status effect is completed.
When you open a chest on a 1 or greater, take monster damage.

Increase the size of the selected stage.
Massively increase the size of selected stage.
Randomly use one of your consumable items without losing it. Manalock for 40 turns.
Use all of your consumable items without losing them. Manalock for 50 turns.

Reveal and apply Burning to random hidden cells until it lands on one without a monster.

Increase your status effect counters by 20.
Set your lives and max lives to the value of target numbered cell.
Whenever a monster dies, it explodes in a 3x3 area.

If you take damage, for the next 10 turns any amount of damage will kill you.
Lose 1 life every 40 turns. Reset this status counter when you leave a stage.

For the next 500 turns, gain a Minion whenever you use a magic item. The next time this activates, get an additional Minion.
For the next 100 turns, gain a Minion whenever you use a magic item.
Spawn a strong familiar at the start of each stage.
At the start of a stage, spawn a number of strong familiars equal to the minimum power.

Whenever you lose life, restore that much life after opening 100 cells.
Whenever you lose life, gain that many souls after opening 50 cells.

Whenever a monster is revealed, your passive items are disabled for 20 turns.

Increase your life cap for the next dimension by 3 times the number of stages since you last took damage.

Whenever you lose an item that isn't Poison, gain Poison.

If target hidden cell has a value of 3 or greater, gain 3 Minions.

Apply Electric to a 3x3 area around target cell.
Lose a random item. After 50 turns, gain 3 copies of that item.
Gain 3 copies of a random inventory item. After 50 turns, lose all copies of that item.
Cut the duration of your status effects in half.
Set the duration of your status effects to 50.

Gain a soul. If you have any pathfinding, gain 3 souls instead.
Unequip and repair all of your armor.

Every 30 cells opened without making a mistake, reduce the stage power by 1.
Every 40 cells opened, reduce the stage power by 1 and gain a Soothing Shell.
Coin drops are now worth 1 more, but diamonds are worth 2 less.
Moving objects and projectiles always travel in the direction of the last cell you opened.
Flag a monster when you begin a stage.
At the start of each stage, flag a number of monsters equal to the stage's max power.
Lose an item whose position in your inventory equals value of target numbered cell.
Gain 1% pathfinding for each stage you have completed.

Increases your chance to find treasure chests.
Spawn a random number of chests between the stage's minimum and maximum power.

Enchant target visible cell: increase the value of this cell by 1 each turn. If it's 10 or greater, reset its value and spawn souls in all visible enchanted cells.

Enchant 10 random cells each stage: when you chord or target this cell with an item, take monster damage and remove the enchantment.
Reduce the stage power by the value of target numbered cell, then spawn that many Cankers.

Whenever you spend coins on a stranger, activate all other strangers.

Gain a soul whenever you lose an item.
Reveal target cell if it's not already open. If the cell has a monster, 200 mana is returned to this item and the monster becomes your familiar.

Restore 1 life whenever you take damage.
Kill target visible monster or stranger and spawn a heart in its place. If you are not injured, spawn a soul instead.
